name: Laggy platformer
description:
Do not play too much (some crashes are your fault =D).

Oh, donations go to a new PC (so I can make good games, my current coding computer is a 20yr old laptop running ubuntu 20.04 because I can't upgrade to 22.04 so I need money lol, there is currently no way to dono lol).

This game was coded in processing-4.0b7 java.

(Stupid) Warning: Linux-amd64.tar.xz extracts into 285 MB.

Move with WASD / arrow keys.

Use Q and E to jump diagonally.

Space to jump.
